content: easy to follow pattern for a unique-looking scarf the dragon scale stitch is like nothing you ve ever tried before with a bulky finish that makes it perfect for keeping your neck warm in the cold weather months there s even instructions on how to add fringe to your end product for a little extra flare this is the perfect gift for the holiday season especially as chillier weather rolls in please feel free to message me if you have any questions about the pattern or any trouble following the instructions
